tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  production_date DATE,
  production_time TIME,
  temperature FLOAT,
  vibration_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE predictive_maintenance (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  production_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (production_id) REFERENCES historical_production_data(production_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    production_line_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    production_line_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PredictiveMaintenance (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    production_line_id INT,
    prediction_result VARCHAR(255),
    confidence_level DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionData (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  production_date DATE,
  production_quantity INT,
  downtime_hours DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  maintenance_log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_hours DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE MachineInformation (
  machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_name VARCHAR(100),
  installation_date DATE,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE PredictiveMaintenance (
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  predicted_date DATE,
  prediction_accuracy DECIMAL,
  predicted_issue VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionData (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    machine_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    pressure FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (timestamp, machine_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MachineStatus (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    status VARCHAR,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE TrendAnalysis (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_description TEXT,
    trend_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE PredictiveMaintenance (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    prediction_date DATE,
    prediction_result VARCHAR
)
